snippet: France's far-right National Front party said it planned to sue Madonna for showing a video at a concert in Paris that depicted Marine Le Pen, the party's president, with a swastika on her forehead.
abstract: France's far-right National Front party said it planned to sue Madonna for showing a video at a concert in Paris that depicted Marine Le Pen, the party's president, with a swastika on her forehead.

headline.main: France's National Front Party Threatens Madonna With Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: French Rightist Party Takes Aim at Madonna
